fields.name: Bench Press
fields.description: A compound exercise for building upper body strength.
fields.instructions: Lie on a flat bench and lower the bar to your chest. Press it back up.

fields.name: Deadlifts
fields.description: One of the best compound exercises for overall strength and muscle building.
fields.instructions: Stand with your feet hip-width apart, grip the barbell, and lift it while keeping your back straight.

fields.name: Squats
fields.description: A fundamental lower body exercise that targets the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.
fields.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower your body by bending your knees and hips, then return to the starting position.

fields.name: Pull-Ups
fields.description: A bodyweight exercise for developing upper body strength and back muscles.
fields.instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away. Pull yourself up until your chin is above the bar, then lower back down.

fields.name: Push-Ups
fields.description: A classic bodyweight exercise for strengthening the chest, shoulders, and triceps.
fields.instructions: Start in a plank position with hands shoulder-width apart. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the ground, then push back up.

fields.name: Barbell Rows
fields.description: An effective compound exercise for building back strength and size.
fields.instructions: Bend over with a barbell in hand, pull it towards your chest, then lower it back down.

fields.name: Lunges
fields.description: A unilateral lower body exercise that targets the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.
fields.instructions: Step forward with one leg and lower your body until both knees are bent at 90 degrees, then return to the starting position.

fields.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
fields.description: An effective shoulder exercise that targets the deltoids.
fields.instructions: Sit on a bench with dumbbells in hand, press them overhead until arms are fully extended, then lower them back down.

fields.name: Dumbbell Bicep Curls
fields.description: An isolation exercise for building bicep strength and size.
fields.instructions: Stand with dumbbells in hand, curl them towards your shoulders while keeping your elbows stationary, then lower them back down.

fields.name: Tricep Dips
fields.description: A bodyweight exercise for targeting the triceps.
fields.instructions: Place your hands on parallel bars, lower your body until your elbows are at 90 degrees, then push back up.

fields.name: Leg Press
fields.description: A machine-based exercise for targeting the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.
fields.instructions: Sit on the leg press machine, press the weight away from your body until legs are fully extended, then return to the starting position.

fields.name: Incline Bench Press
fields.description: A variation of the bench press that targets the upper chest.
fields.instructions: Lie on an incline bench and perform a bench press motion with a barbell.

fields.name: Lat Pulldowns
fields.description: A machine-based exercise for targeting the back muscles, particularly the latissimus dorsi.
fields.instructions: Sit at a lat pulldown machine, grasp the bar, pull it down to your chest, then return it to the starting position.

fields.name: Calf Raises
fields.description: An exercise for strengthening the calf muscles.
fields.instructions: Stand on a calf raise machine or a raised surface with your heels hanging off, then lift your heels as high as possible before lowering them back down.

fields.name: Hamstring Curls
fields.description: An isolation exercise for targeting the hamstring muscles.
fields.instructions: Lie face down on a hamstring curl machine, curl your legs up towards your glutes, then lower them back down.

fields.name: Dumbbell Lunges
fields.description: A variation of lunges using dumbbells for added resistance.
fields.instructions: Hold dumbbells in each hand, step forward with one leg and lower your body until both knees are bent at 90 degrees, then return to the starting position.

fields.name: Seated Cable Rows
fields.description: A machine-based exercise for targeting the back muscles, particularly the lats and rhomboids.
fields.instructions: Sit at a cable row machine, grasp the handles, pull them towards your torso, then return them to the starting position.

fields.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
fields.description: A variation of the bench press using dumbbells for added stability.
fields.instructions: Lie on a bench with dumbbells in hand, press them upwards until arms are fully extended, then lower them back down.

fields.name: Leg Extensions
fields.description: An isolation exercise for targeting the quadriceps muscles.
fields.instructions: Sit on a leg extension machine, extend your legs until they are parallel to the ground, then return them to the starting position.

fields.name: Russian Twists
fields.description: An exercise for strengthening the obliques and core muscles.
fields.instructions: Sit on the floor with your knees bent, lean back slightly, and rotate your torso from side to side while holding a weight or medicine ball.

fields.name: Plank
fields.description: A static exercise for strengthening the core muscles.
fields.instructions: Get into a push-up position, but with your weight on your forearms instead of your hands, and hold the position for as long as possible.

fields.name: Reverse Crunches
fields.description: An exercise for targeting the lower abdominal muscles.
fields.instructions: Lie on your back with your knees bent and lift your hips off the ground while bringing your knees towards your chest, then lower them back down.

fields.name: Overhead Tricep Extensions
fields.description: An exercise for targeting the triceps muscles.
fields.instructions: Stand with a dumbbell in hand, extend your arm overhead, then lower the dumbbell behind your head until your forearm is parallel to the ground, then extend it back up.

fields.name: Hanging Leg Raises
fields.description: An exercise for targeting the lower abdominal muscles.
fields.instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar with legs straight, raise your legs until they are parallel to the ground, then lower them back down.

fields.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Shrugs
fields.description: An exercise for targeting the trapezius muscles.
fields.instructions: Stand with dumbbells in hand, shrug your shoulders upwards towards your ears, then lower them back down.

fields.name: Side Lateral Raises
fields.description: An exercise for targeting the lateral deltoids.
fields.instructions: Stand with dumbbells in hand, raise them to the sides until arms are parallel to the ground, then lower them back down.

fields.name: Barbell Curls
fields.description: A classic bicep exercise for building arm strength and size.
fields.instructions: Stand with a barbell in hand, curl it towards your shoulders while keeping your elbows stationary, then lower it back down.
